from django import forms
from .models import Customer, Product, PurchaseRecord, PreferredProduct

class CustomerForm(forms.ModelForm):
    """
    Form for managing customer records.
    """

class ProductForm(forms.ModelForm):
    """
    Form for managing product records.
    """

class PurchaseRecordForm(forms.ModelForm):
    """
    Form for managing purchase records, excluding datetime.
    """

class PreferredProductForm(forms.ModelForm):
    """
    Form for managing preferred products linking customers and products.
    """

from django.db import models

class Customer(models.Model):
    """
    Model representing a customer.
    """

    def __str__(self):
        """
        Return a string representation of the customer.
        """

class Product(models.Model):
    """
    Model representing a product.
    """
    def __str__(self):
        """
        Return a string representation of the product.
        """

class PurchaseRecord(models.Model):
    """
    Model representing a purchase record.
    """

    def __str__(self):
        """
        Return a string representation of the purchase record.
        """

class PreferredProduct(models.Model):
    """
    Model representing a customer's preferred product.
    """

    def __str__(self):
        """
        Return a string representation of the preferred product.
        """

from django.urls import path
from . import views

urlpatterns = [
    # Customer URLs
    path('', views.customer_list, name='customer_list'),
    path('customers/add/', views.add_customer, name='add_customer'),
    path('customers/edit/<int:pk>/', views.edit_customer, name='edit_customer'),
    path('customers/delete/<int:pk>/', views.delete_customer, name='delete_customer'),

    # Product URLs
    path('products/', views.product_list, name='product_list'),
    path('products/add/', views.add_product, name='add_product'),
    path('products/edit/<int:pk>/', views.edit_product, name='edit_product'),
    path('products/delete/<int:pk>/', views.delete_product, name='delete_product'),

    path('purchases/', views.purchase_record_list, name='purchase_record_list'),
    path('purchases/add/', views.add_purchase_record, name='add_purchase_record'),
    path('purchases/edit/<int:pk>/', views.edit_purchase_record, name='edit_purchase_record'),
    path('purchases/delete/<int:pk>/', views.delete_purchase_record, name='delete_purchase_record'),

    path('preferred_products_list/', views.preferred_products_list, name='preferred_products_list'),
    path('preferred-products/add/', views.add_preferred_product, name='add_preferred_product'),
    path('preferred-products/edit/<int:pk>/', views.edit_preferred_product, name='edit_preferred_product'),
    path('preferred-products/delete/<int:pk>/', views.delete_preferred_product, name='delete_preferred_product'),

    # Sales Analysis
    path('sales-analysis/', views.generate_sales_report, name='generate_sales_report'),

]

from django.shortcuts import render, get_object_or_404, redirect
from .models import Customer, Product, PurchaseRecord, PreferredProduct
from .forms import CustomerForm, ProductForm, PurchaseRecordForm, PreferredProductForm
from django.db.models import Sum


# Customer Views

def customer_list(request):
    """
    Display a list of all customers.
    """

def add_customer(request):
    """
    Add a new customer to the system.
    """


def edit_customer(request, pk):
    """
    Edit an existing customer's details.
    """


def delete_customer(request, pk):
    """
    Delete a customer from the system.
    """

# Product Views

def product_list(request):
    """
    Display a list of all products.
    """


def add_product(request):
    """
    Add a new product to the system.
    """


def edit_product(request, pk):
    """
    Edit an existing product's details.
    """


def delete_product(request, pk):
    """
    Delete a product from the system.
    """

# PurchaseRecord Views

def purchase_record_list(request):
    """
    Display a list of all purchase records.
    """


def add_purchase_record(request):
    """
    Add a new purchase record to the system.
    """


def edit_purchase_record(request, pk):
    """
    Edit an existing purchase record's details.
    """

def delete_purchase_record(request, pk):
    """
    Delete a purchase record from the system.
    """

# PreferredProduct Views

def preferred_products_list(request):
    """
    Display a list of all preferred products.
    """


def add_preferred_product(request):
    """
    Add a new preferred product to the system.
    """


def edit_preferred_product(request, pk):
    """
    Edit an existing preferred product's details.
    """


def delete_preferred_product(request, pk):
    """
    Delete a preferred product from the system.
    """


def generate_sales_report(request):
    """
    Generate a sales report with total quantity and sales amount.
    """

from django.contrib import admin
from django.urls import path, include

urlpatterns = [
    path('admin/', admin.site.urls),
    path('', include('example_app.urls')),
]
